tt1219827.title: Ghost in the Shell

tt4158096.title: Free Fire
tt4158096.summary: Set in Boston in 1978, a meeting in a deserted warehouse between two gangs turns into a shootout and a game of survival.

tt4649466.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle

tt2094766.title: Assassin's Creed

tt0451279.title: Wonder Woman

tt1790809.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
tt1790809.summary: Captain Jack Sparrow searches for the trident of Poseidon.

tt3498820.title: Captain America: Civil War
tt3498820.summary: Political interference in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between former allies Captain America and Iron Man.

tt3315342.title: Logan
tt3315342.summary: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X somewhere on the Mexican border. However, Logan's attempts to hide from the world and his legacy are upended when a young mutant arrives, pursued by dark forces.

tt4116284.title: The LEGO Batman Movie

tt3385516.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
tt3385516.summary: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant, world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan.

tt1431045.title: Deadpool
tt1431045.summary: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a quest for revenge.

tt4425200.title: John Wick: Chapter 2

tt3717252.title: Underworld: Blood Wars

tt3896198.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
tt3896198.summary: Set to the backdrop of Awesome Mixtape #2, 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' continues the team's adventures as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.

tt1386697.title: Suicide Squad

tt2034800.title: The Great Wall

tt4680182.title: Colossal

tt3450958.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
tt3450958.summary: After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind.

tt2072233.title: Sleepless
tt2072233.summary: A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld scours a nightclub in search of his kidnapped son.

tt2015381.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
tt2015381.summary: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

tt3748528.title: Rogue One
tt3748528.summary: The Rebel Alliance makes a risky move to steal the plans for the Death Star, setting up the epic saga to follow.

tt2345759.title: The Mummy
tt2345759.summary: An ancient princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia, and terrors that defy human comprehension.

tt1211837.title: Doctor Strange
tt1211837.summary: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

tt4154756.title: Avengers: Infinity War
tt4154756.summary: The plot is unknown at this time.

tt3501632.title: Thor: Ragnarök
tt3501632.summary: Thor must face the Hulk in a gladiator match and save his people from the ruthless Hela.

tt0468569.title: The Dark Knight
tt0468569.summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the Dark Knight must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.

tt2488496.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
tt2488496.summary: Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. The First Order attempts to rule the galaxy and only a ragtag group of heroes can stop them, along with the help of the Resistance.

tt3095734.title: Monster Trucks
tt3095734.summary: In a small town, an oil company is drilling for oil. The geologist, Dowd, informs his boss, Tenneson that they detected what could be an ecosystem which could affect their drilling rights. ...                See full summary »

tt0113568.title: Kôkaku Kidôtai
tt0113568.summary: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

tt3640424.title: Allied
tt3640424.summary: In 1942, a Canadian intelligence officer in North Africa encounters a female French Resistance fighter on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of war.

tt1648190.title: The Dark Tower
tt1648190.summary: The Gunslinger, Roland Deschain, roams an Old West-like landscape where "the world has moved on" in pursuit of the man in black. Also searching for the fabled Dark Tower, in the hopes that reaching it will preserve his dying world.

tt2975590.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice

tt3731562.title: Kong: Skull Island
tt3731562.summary: A team of scientists explore an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.

tt1212428.title: The Lost City of Z
tt1212428.summary: A true-life drama, centering on British explorer Col. Percival Fawcett, who disappeared while searching for a mysterious city in the Amazon in the 1920s.

tt1628841.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
tt1628841.summary: Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion, Earth is faced with a new extra-Solar threat. But will mankind's new space defenses be enough?

tt2239822.title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
tt2239822.summary: A dark force threatens Alpha, a vast metropolis and home to species from a thousand planets. Special operatives Valerian and Laureline must race to identify the marauding menace and safeguard not just Alpha, but the future of the universe.

tt5034474.title: The Assignment
tt5034474.summary: After waking up and discovering that he has undergone gender reassignment surgery, an assassin seeks to find the doctor responsible.

tt3371366.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
tt3371366.summary: Humans and Transformers are at war, Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving our future lies buried in the secrets of the past, in the hidden history of Transformers on Earth.

tt0974015.title: Justice League
tt0974015.summary: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

tt1972591.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
tt1972591.summary: Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.

tt0942385.title: Tropic Thunder
tt0942385.summary: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

tt3717490.title: Power Rangers
tt3717490.summary: A group of high-school students, who are infused with unique superpowers, harness their abilities in order to save the world.

tt4630562.title: The Fate of the Furious

tt0493405.title: CHIPS

tt2592614.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter

tt2527336.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi

tt2250912.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming

tt2140479.title: The Accountant
tt2140479.summary: As a math savant uncooks the books for a new client, the Treasury Department closes in on his activities and the body count starts to rise.
